mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW R LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_INFO M ON R.MEMBER_IDX = M.IDX WHERE R.VEHICLE_IDX=#{idx} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT=#{content} WHERE IDX =#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW.*, REVIEW_IDX FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN REPORT ON REVIEW.IDX = REPORT.REVIEW_IDX WHERE REPORT.IDX = #{idx}
